articles.title: Hottest-ever year in Asia sees region blasted by droughts and extreme weather - Yahoo Philippines News
articles.description: Heat extremes included a temperature of 38C at Verkhoyansk, Russian Federation, provisionally the highest known temperature anywhere north of the Arctic...

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Southeast Asian leaders rebuke Myanmar junta after ASEAN summit no-show - Rappler
articles.description: The Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN) says it would accept a non-political figure from Myanmar, but the junta rejects that, saying it would only agree to its leader or a minister attending
articles.content: In an unprecedented snub to the leader of a member state, ASEAN had decided to sideline junta chief Min Aung Hlaing, who led a February 1 coup that spiralled into violence and nationwide chaos, for h… [+122 chars]
